'''Everbloom Violet''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Astute Amusement" [[Yae Miko]] ({{Electro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The first run of this Event Wish marks [[Fischl]]'s first rate up reappearance after 11 banners (14 if including periods with Character Event Wish-2s).
** Her last rate up appearance was [[Klee]]'s second run, [[Sparkling Steps/2021-06-09]] back in [[Version 1.6]].
